email.subject: Congratulations #PLAYERNAME#!
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#, Hacker names that are listed below have made it through to the next set of challenges. These challenges will involve both team building and much harder hacks.
This email is also a special congratulations to the following people for making it through the Solo hacks.
Hackers Through: - "5plinter" - "Naix" - "Grim4ce" - "Cryp7o" - "Ph4n745m" - "Ch1m3r4" - "#PLAYERNAME#" - "r00t"
From all the Hacker Wars team; We wish you the best of luck in the next set of challenges!
